title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, November 28, 2021
description: It's the birthday of poet and artist William Blake, (1757). "Without minute neatness of execution, the sublime cannot exist! Grandeur of ideas is founded on precision of ideas."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of poet and artist William Blake, (1757). "Without minute neatness of execution, the sublime cannot exist! Grandeur of ideas is founded on precision of ideas."
